verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: Undoubtedly, there has come upon man a time when there was no mentioning of his name anywhere.
verse.verse_2: Undoubtedly, We created man from a mingled spermdrop that We might try him; so We made him hearing, seeing.
verse.verse_3: Undoubtedly, We have shown him the way, whether he be grateful or ungrateful.
verse.verse_4: Undoubtedly, We have already prepared for the infidels chains and iron collars and a blazing fire.
verse.verse_5: Undoubtedly, the virtuous will drink of a cup whereof the admixture is camphor.
verse.verse_6: What is the camphor, it is spring wherefrom the most special bondmen of Allah will drink. They will make it gush forth wherever they would like in their places.
verse.verse_7: They fulfil their vows, and fear a day the evil of which is wide-spread.
verse.verse_8: And they feed, for love of Him, the poor, the orphan and the prisoner.
verse.verse_9: They say to them, 'We feed you for Allah's pleasure only. We desire no recompense or thanks from you.
verse.verse_10: 'Undoubtedly, we fear from our Lord a day which is frowning and very hard.'
verse.verse_11: So Allah has saved them from the evil of that day and granted them cheerfulness and happiness.
verse.verse_12: And recompensed them for their patience with a Garden, and silken clothes.
verse.verse_13: They will be reclined upon couches in the Garden; neither will they see therein sunny heat nor excessive cold.
verse.verse_14: And its shades will be inclined over them, and its clusters would have been made hanging down.
verse.verse_15: And there shall be passed around them silver vessels and goblets which will be bright as' glass.
verse.verse_16: What type of glass, glass of silver, the cupbearers, would have placed them on complete measurement.
verse.verse_17: And therein, they shall be made to drink a cup whose mixture will be ginger.
verse.verse_18: What ginger is, it is a spring in the Paradise called Sal-Sabil.
verse.verse_19: And never aging youths shall go around them for service, when you see them, you think them to be pearls sprinkled.
verse.verse_20: And when you look to them, you see a bliss and a great Kingdom.
verse.verse_21: Upon their bodies, there are green silken garments and brocade and are made to wear bracelets of silver. And their Lord made them to drink pure beverage.
verse.verse_22: It will be told to them, this is your recompense, and your labour bore fruits.
verse.verse_23: Undoubtedly, We have sent down the Quran on you in piecemeal.
verse.verse_24: So be you patient under the order of your Lord, and hear not anyone of them sinner or unthankful.
verse.verse_25: And remember the name of your Lord Morning and evening.
verse.verse_26: And in part of night, prostrate yourself before Him and magnify Him through the long night.
verse.verse_27: Undoubtedly, these people love the things under feet, and has already left behind a heavy day.
verse.verse_28: We created them, and strengthened their joints, and, when We will, We shall exchange their likes.
verse.verse_29: This is a reminder; so whoever wills, let him take a path to his Lord.
verse.verse_30: Yet you cannot will, unless God wills. God is Knowing and Wise.
verse.verse_31: He admits into His mercy whomever He wills. But as for the wrongdoers, He has prepared for them a painful punishment.
